pageContext.claim: “I hereby demand, and will do so officially tomorrow, that the Department of Justice look into whether or not the FBI/DOJ infiltrated or surveilled the Trump Campaign for Political Purposes - and if any such demands or requests were made by people within the Obama Administration!”
pageContext.analysis: It has been reported that an FBI informant in Europe, a professor named Stefan Halper, met with at least three people working on the Trump campaign in Europe. So far, there has been nothing to indicate whether there was a political agenda in Halper's assistance to the FBI, which started after the agency opened a counterintelligence probe. No evidence has surfaced to prove Trump's related claim that President Barack Obama had Trump wiretapped.
